ModMetaData.name: Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security
ModMetaData.author: Oskar Potocki, Sokyran, Taranchuk
ModMetaData.description:
Vanilla Furniture Expanded - Security is a complete overhaul and rebalance of the original security module, addressing outdated balance and vastly expanding defensive options from early to late game. The mod introduces new defenses across all tech levels:
- Medieval: Adds the catapults, cavalry spikes, ballistas and re-armable bear traps.
- Industrial: Expands automated turrets with the military turrets, flamer turrets, concealed barriers, shotgun turrets and more.
- Trench Warfare: Dugouts, trenches, platforms, razor wire and HMG and minigun complexes!
- Spacer: Charge turrets, charge complexes, railguns, tesla blasters and shockmines.
All original structures are rebalanced or reimplemented. Outstanding issues have been fixed. Existing content got new mechanics added, and new content has been implemented. Your beloved security mod is back, and better than ever!
